Title: countSubstrings
Description: Returns how often a substring needle occurs in a string haystack.
Functions countSubstringsCaseInsensitive and countSubstringsCaseInsensitiveUTF8 provide case-insensitive and case-insensitive + UTF-8 variants of this function respectively.
haystack — String in which the search is performed. String.needle — Substring to be searched. String.start_pos – Position (1-based) in haystack at which the search starts. UInt. Optional.
